BATTLE OF TYRIL

README

Thank you for downloading Battle of Tyril!

 

Licence Information

Battle of Tyril by Andrew Godfroy is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 2.5 Canada License.
Open Source Code can be found within the .py file inside the DIST folder  

 

Controls

 

Keyboard

WSAD - Movement

Mouse- Shoot

Arrow Keys - Select Menu Item
Space - Select Menu Item/Ready
Escape - Pause/Go Back 

 

Joystick

Note: Only Xbox 360 Controller is officially supported, You can try with others but there is no guarantee it will work

Left Thumbstick -Movement

Right Thumbstick - Shoot

A - Select Menu Item
B - Go Back
D-Pad - Select Menu Item/Select Ship
Start - Ready/Pause
Back - Exit/Go Back
